channel.title: [pi] help
channel.description: Okay Guys... How Do I Find The Shops NPC Id? Here Is The Shop I Want The NPC Id For.. [code]shop = 7 Stall_Items 2 2 1897 1 1898 1 950 1 951 1 1635 1 1636 1 7650 1 7651 1 1613 1 1614 1[/code] Also When I Get His ID How Do I Move Him? Like, What File Do I Change His Cords To?

Anyway, to move NPCs - spawn-config.cfg (or .txt)[/quote]Calm Down I Got 1000000 Things To Do In A Little Amout Of Time, And I Made A New Topic Because ITS A NEW TOPIC!

Also When I Get His ID How Do I Move Him? Like, What File Do I Change His Cords To?
